divs: Sighting Detailsi want to talk about what i saw, i saw a program that ufos dont exist because people can not remember things correctly after time, i dont remember a lot of things correct but this has made such an impact on me i cant forget. i dont know what i saw but would like to. i will take a lie detector test, hypnosis or anything that will help me understand what i saw. i dont remember the date year, the month or the day i cant remember, the time is approx. base on the time some got off work i know it was summer because of daylight savings( days are longer) ok here is my truth ( not a story) i was picking up my girl friend sister from work, she got off at 7pm or 7:30pm, we ( me and my girl friend, at that time) were driving 5 mile to pick up her sister from work, i was driving she ( the girl friend) leaned over and pointed out my window she asked me what is that, without really looking just glancing i said the sun, but i knew when i finished my statement it was not the sun, we continue to watch the object for a few seconds, i'm driving, watching the object then i notice a state trooper coming towards me in the other lane( two lane road) i checked my speed, i knew u was not speeding because i slow down to watch the object, i became angry when i saw the trooper do a u turn because i thought i was getting stopped, but he pulled over and parked, i guess he saw the object to, we continued to watch this object as we drove, it was huge and orange, no sound. i don't know what it was and i don't know what happen to it, it was there then it disappeared, it did not float to the ground, the last thing i remember it was huge like the sun and the after a couple of minutes it was gone from the sky. it disappeared it did not land. i don't know what it was but i know what it wasn't. it wasn't a plane (no sound) a flare (it never sunk towards the ground) and it was not the sun ( it was dust, the sun had set) it seemed to stop in the air when i first saw it, then like a light bulb it was there then it was gone in minutes, it was so big.
